title: What Is a Budget?
description: A budget is a plan for how you'll use your money - giving every dollar a job before you spend it.

title: The 50/30/20 Rule
description: Allocate 50% to needs, 30% to wants, and 20% to savings and debt. A common starting point.

title: Understanding Credit Scores
description: Learn how your credit score is calculated and how it affects loans, rent, opportunies, and more.

title: What To Do If You're in Debt
description: There's no shame in debt. This guide helps you organize, prioritize, and make a plan.

title: How to Start an Emergency Fund
description: An emergency fund is savings for unexpected expenses such as: medical bills, car repair, pet care, or job loss.

title: Financial Abuse: What It Is and How to Get Help
description: Recognize the signs of financial control and find supportive resources for reclaiming autonomy.
